name: Worm Rush
description:
"The undergrowth is a dark and dangerous place, and you're just a worm!

However, you're a worm with a plan. To get home, you need to collect beacons that grant you the power to explore new paths, cutting through the dense, thorny forest floor and purifying it as you go! This little puzzler is sure to test your brain box as you happily worm your way home."

Credits - 

Designed and developed - Ayush Bhardwas (aka Ash Badas)

Art and animation - Henry Turner ( aka DukeBox)

Music - www.purple-planet.com 

Sound - www.zapsplat.com
